hopobject.name: reacTIVision
hopobject.body: Porting the reacTIVision computer vision framework to the BeagleBoard. This will allow for the creation of simple, low-cost multi-touch tables and devices. All that's needed to make use of this is a working webcam, a network connection, and objects printed with the fiducial symbols used by the engine.
hopobject.shortdesc: Porting the reacTIVision computer vision framework to the BeagleBoard. This will allow for the creation of simple, low-cost multi-touch tables and devices.
